title: Offer your prayers of protection this Narasimha Jayanti. Sponsor a special Narasimha Homa
speaker: HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa

segments.text: As a part of the Narsimha Jayanti celebrations at ISKCON Bangalore, devotees will perform
an elaborate Narsimha Yajna. Seek Lord Narsimha's divine protection from all obstacles in life
by sponsoring this powerful Yajna. You will receive special Yajna Prasadam delivered to
your home as a mark of His blessings for peace and prosperity. Don't miss this unique opportunity.
